text: Trevor van Riemsdyk (born July 24, 1991) is an American ice hockey defenseman. He currently plays for the Chicago Blackhawks of the National Hockey League (NHL). ==Career== Before playing in the NHL, van Riemsdyk played 29 games of high school hockey at the Christian Brothers Academy in Lincroft, New Jersey. He then played 2 years with New Hampshire Junior Monarchs of the Eastern Junior Hockey League (EJHL) and 3 years with the New Hampshire Wildcats. He was impressive enough in his sophomore year to be named to the 2012-13 All- Hockey East First Team. On March 24, 2014, the Chicago Blackhawks signed van Riemsdyk to a two-year entry-level deal. On October 9, 2014, he made his NHL debut in a 3â€“2 shootout win against the Dallas Stars. ==Personal life== His brother James van Riemsdyk also plays in the NHL for the Toronto Maple Leafs. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey defensemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Trevor van Riemsdyk
